title: Confused protocol schedule from genesis

labels.name: P4
labels.description: Low (ex: Node doesn't start up when the configuration file has unexpected "end-of-line" character)

labels.name: non mainnet (private networks)
labels.description: not related to mainnet features - covers privacy, permissioning, IBFT2, QBFT

body:
Besu startup with the attached genesis config produces nonsensical protocol schedule and will not startup:


```
starting main client: /opt/besu/bin/besu --logging=INFO --data-storage-format=BONSAI --genesis-file=/genesis.json  --min-gas-price=1 --tx-pool-price-bump=0 --network-id=3503995874084926 --kzg-trusted-setup=/trusted_setup.txt --host-allowlist=* --rpc-http-enabled --rpc-http-api=DEBUG,ETH,NET,WEB3,ADMIN --rpc-http-host=0.0.0.0 --rpc-ws-enabled --rpc-ws-api=DEBUG,ETH,NET,WEB3,ADMIN --rpc-ws-host=0.0.0.0 --engine-host-allowlist=* --engine-jwt-enabled --engine-jwt-secret /jwtsecret blocks import --run --skip-pow-validation-enabled --from=/chain.rlp
2023-11-13 14:26:27.176+00:00 | main | INFO  | BlocksSubCommand | Import RLP block data from 1 files
2023-11-13 14:26:27.733+00:00 | main | INFO  | KeyPairUtil | Generated new secp256k1 public key 0xa1205fd4ffed835ac0b9bf320c5ba931570652ef30df492fcfb4d04c553cde88edb7fcf5e030b86d953395541d690741c3e2f06151712b9382f65d8a56b3dc20 and stored it to /opt/besu/key
2023-11-13 14:26:27.912+00:00 | main | INFO  | ProtocolScheduleBuilder | Protocol schedule created with milestones: [Homestead:0, TangerineWhistle:6, SpuriousDragon:12, Byzantium:18, Constantinople:24, Petersburg:30, Istanbul:36, MuirGlacier:42, Berlin:48, London:54, ArrowGlacier:60, GrayGlacier:66,
 Shanghai:780, Cancun:840]
2023-11-13 14:26:27.975+00:00 | main | INFO  | ProtocolScheduleBuilder | Protocol schedule created with milestones: [Paris:0, Paris:6, Paris:12, Paris:18, Paris:24, Paris:30, Paris:36, Paris:42, Paris:48, Paris:54, Paris:60, Paris:66, Shanghai:780, Cancun:840]
2023-11-13 14:26:27.998+00:00 | main | INFO  | RocksDBKeyValueStorageFactory | No existing database detected at /opt/besu. Using version 2
2023-11-13 14:26:28.186+00:00 | main | INFO  | BonsaiWorldStateKeyValueStorage | Bonsai flat db mode found PARTIAL
2023-11-13 14:26:28.226+00:00 | main | INFO  | TransactionPoolFactory | Enabling transaction pool
2023-11-13 14:26:28.231+00:00 | main | INFO  | EthPeers | Updating the default best peer comparator
2023-11-13 14:26:28.237+00:00 | main | INFO  | BesuControllerBuilder | TTD difficulty is present, creating initial sync for PoS
2023-11-13 14:26:28.247+00:00 | main | INFO  | TransitionBesuControllerBuilder | TTD present, creating DefaultSynchronizer that stops propagating after finalization
2023-11-13 14:26:28.255+00:00 | main | INFO  | BlocksSubCommand | Importing from /chain.rlp
2023-11-13 14:26:28.645+00:00 | pool-9-thread-1 | INFO  | CalculatedDifficultyValidationRule | Invalid block header: difficulty 0 does not equal expected difficulty 131776
2023-11-13 14:26:28.647+00:00 | pool-9-thread-1 | INFO  | MainnetBlockValidator | Invalid block 72 (0x6fb7a687f0d44109d5eb1fcd03c754d638f39f75498298bf9512f5de310fc814): Optional[header validation rule violated, see logs]
java.lang.RuntimeException: Error importing block 74
```

[protoSched.json](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/files/13339443/protoSched.json)

Interestingly, this depends on clearing our the datadir between runs. If you rerun this test again on the existing db, it finishes out importing.  It also passes when suspending in a debugger, suggesting a concurrency issue.
